alert.note: Alert for Anne Arundel (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 04 at 6:28PM EDT until August 04 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN ANNE ARUNDEL...SOUTHERN BALTIMORE AND NORTHEASTERN PRINCE GEORGES COUNTIES AND SOUTHEASTERN BALTIMORE CITY... At 628 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over South Gate, or over Baltimore-Washington Airport, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. Locations impacted include... Baltimore, Bowie, Severn, Riviera Beach, Baltimore-Washington Airport, Fort Smallwood State Park, Glen Burnie, Severna Park, Odenton, Pasadena, Lake Shore, Ferndale, Brooklyn Park, Fort Meade, Millersville, South Gate, Green Haven, Pumphrey, Glenn Dale and Linthicum. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
